metadata.dc:author: Jimeno, M
Del Villar, V
Asensio, M
Del Pozo, L J
Vilella, J
metadata.dc:description: We report the case of a sixty-seven-years-old male diagnosed of a gastric adenocarcinoma that presented brown pigmentation in the dorsal of his both hands and fingernails while being on treatment with ftorafur, an analogous of 5-fluorouracil. To our knowledge this side effect has not been previously reported for ftorafur.
metadata.dc:title: Pigmentación cutánea y ungueal por ftorafur.
[Skin and ungual pigmentation caused by ftorafur].
